case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
quoteText:
These rights may include:

  • To access your Personal Data held by us (right to access);
  • To rectify inaccurate Personal Data and, taking into account the purpose of processing the Personal Data, ensure it is complete (right to rectification);
  • To erase/delete your Personal Data, to the extent permitted by applicable data protection laws (right to erasure. right to be forgotten);

case: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
quoteText: What Personal Data do we collect?

case: Your personal data is used for advertising
quoteText: >To display personalized advertisements to you

case: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
quoteText: to send to you marketing communications about us, our products and our services.

case: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
quoteText: <li>To restrict our processing of your Personal Data to the extent permitted by law (right to restriction of processing);

case: You can retrieve an archive of your data
quoteText: To transfer your Personal Data to another controller, to the extent possible (right to data portability);

case: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
quoteText: Purposes for which we process Personal Data and the legal bases on which we rely

case: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
quoteText: For the avoidance of doubt, our Privacy Statement does not apply to the extent we process Personal Data in the role of a processor on behalf of our customers.

case: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
quoteText: Third-party social media and advertising networks, which usually act as separate controllers, so that we can advertise on their platforms;

case: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
quoteText: if we are involved in a merger, reorganization, asset sale or business combination.

case: Personal information that is shared outside its jurisdiction is processed according to the original jurisdiction’s data protection standards
quoteText:
As described in the "International transfer of Personal Data" section of our full Privacy Statement, we have implemented safeguards to ensure an adequate level of data protection where your Personal Data is transferred to countries outside the EEA, such as standard contractual clauses for the transfer of Personal Data as approved by the European Commission (Art.
46 GDPR).
